html: (1 Nephi 21:23; 2 Nephi 6:7; 10:9)."Kings shall be thy nursing fathers, and their queens thy nursing mothers." The mighty of the earth royalty, presidents, government ministers shall assist in the process of gathering the house of Israel. This could be through financial assistance to enable them to return to their homelands, such as the Jews to the Holy Land, or it could be in removing legal barriers that heretofore have prevented the preaching and establishment of the restored gospel in their lands. (See BICQ, 129-30.)
